channel.title: CVE Feed for techlabpro1 -- The Post Grid – Shortcode, Gutenberg Blocks and Elementor Addon for Post Grid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for techlabpro1 -- The Post Grid – Shortcode, Gutenberg Blocks and Elementor Addon for Post Grid

item.title: CVE-2024-3936|2024-08-01T20:26:57.209Z -- techlabpro1 -- the%20post%20grid%20%E2%80%93%20shortcode%2C%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20elementor%20addon%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: The The Post Grid – Shortcode, Gutenberg Blocks and Elementor Addon for Post Grid plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the rtTPGSaveSettings function in all versions up to, and including, 7.6.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to change the plugin's settings and invoke other functions hooked by AJAX actions.

item.title: CVE-2024-1427|2024-07-03T19:03:25.878Z -- techlabpro1 -- the%20post%20grid%20%E2%80%93%20shortcode%2C%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20elementor%20addon%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: The The Post Grid – Shortcode, Gutenberg Blocks and Elementor Addon for Post Grid plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the section title tag attribute in all versions up to, and including, 7.7.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3936|2024-06-04T17:32:42.954Z -- techlabpro1 -- the%20post%20grid%20%E2%80%93%20shortcode%2C%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20elementor%20addon%20for%20post%20grid

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to change the plugin's settings and invoke other functions hooked by AJAX actions.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
